data.comment: The match is underway at Stade de la Mosson.
Can Montpellier get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Angers's half?
In the minute 1, Angers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Angers.
Throw-in for Montpellier in the half of Angers.
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Angers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Angers in their own half.
Stephanie Frappart awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 8, Can Angers capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Montpellier's half?
Throw-in Montpellier.
Angers's Angelo Fulgini gets in a shot on goal at Stade de la Mosson. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 9, Angers needs to be cautious. Montpellier have an attacking throw-in.
Can Montpellier capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Enzo Ebosse is booked for the away team.
In the minute 13, In Montpellier Montpellier drive forward through Teji Savanier. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Stephanie Frappart signals a throw-in for Montpellier, close to Angers's area.
Teji Savanier (Montpellier) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 14, Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
Goal kick for Angers at Stade de la Mosson.
In Montpellier a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 16, Free kick Angers.
Daniel Congre for Montpellier has been booked by Stephanie Frappart and receives a first yellow card.
Mateo Pavlovic's header is off-target for Angers.
In the minute 17, It's a goal kick for the home team in Montpellier.
Goal! Arnaud Souquet gives Montpellier a 1-0 lead.
Gaetan Laborde instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 19, Throw-in high up the field for Angers in Montpellier.
Throw-in for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Angers close to the penalty box.
Angers drive upfield and Thomas Mangani gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Montpellier defender.
Angers to take a throw-in in Montpellier territory.
In the minute 25, Angers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! Angers go level at 1-1 through Stephane Bahoken in Montpellier.
Angelo Fulgini with an assist there.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Montpellier in their own half.
Montpellier have a dangerous throw-in.
Stephanie Frappart awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Angers in their own half.
Angers needs to be cautious. Montpellier have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Angers.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Angers in the half of Montpellier.
In Montpellier a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Andy Delort (Montpellier) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 34, Angers's Pierrick Capelle attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Montpellier have a goal kick.
Stephanie Frappart signals a throw-in for Montpellier, close to Angers's area.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Angers at Stade de la Mosson.
Andy Delort gets his shot on target but fails to score for Montpellier.
Ball safe as Angers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 41, Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Arnaud Souquet (Montpellier) gets a yellow card.
Montpellier's Andy Delort scores with his head to give his side a 2-1 lead.
In the minute 43, Great play from Gaetan Laborde to set up the goal.
Stephanie Frappart signals a Angers throw-in in Montpellier's half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Stade de la Mosson.
Throw-in for Angers close to the penalty box.
Michel Der Zakarian is making the team's first substitution at Stade de la Mosson with Junior Sambia replacing Arnaud Souquet.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Montpellier have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Angers.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Angers.
Corner awarded to Angers.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
In the minute 54, Free kick Montpellier.
Andy Delort is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Andy Delort is back on his feet again.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Angers's Stephane Bahoken has been booked in Montpellier.
In the minute 57, Pedro Mendes returns to the field for Montpellier after picking up a slight injury.
Attention is being given to Montpellierâ€™s Pedro Mendes and play has been suspended briefly.
Montpellier are pushing forward but Andy Delort's finish is wide of the goal.
Stephanie Frappart awards Angers a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Ball goes out of play for a Angers goal kick.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
Andy Delort heads in to give Montpellier a 3-1 lead at Stade de la Mosson.
In the minute 60, That's a fine assist from Junior Sambia.
Can Angers capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Montpellier's half?
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, Mateo Pavlovic (Angers) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Sada Thioub is replacing Lassana Coulibaly for Angers at Stade de la Mosson.
Stephane Moulin (Angers) is making a second substitution, with Rayan Ait-Nouri replacing Enzo Ebosse.
In the minute 64, In Montpellier, Antonin Bobichon of Angers is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Angers.
In the minute 66, Nicolas Cozza (Montpellier) has received a yellow card from Stephanie Frappart.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
Montpellier's Andy Delort gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Angers defender.
In the minute 68, The home team have replaced Nicolas Cozza with Ambroise Oyongo. This is the second substitution made today by Michel Der Zakarian.
Throw-in high up the field for Angers in Montpellier.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 71, Montpellier have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Angers at Stade de la Mosson.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Montpellier just outside Angers's area.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Andy Delort (Montpellier) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Angers defenders.
Stephane Moulin is making the team's fourth substitution at Stade de la Mosson with Mohamed Ali Cho replacing Stephane Bahoken.
In the minute 73, Lois Diony is replacing Thomas Mangani for Angers at Stade de la Mosson.
Montpellier make their third substitution with Florent Mollet replacing Damien Le Tallec.
Junior Sambia of Montpellier smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Throw-in for Angers in their own half.
In Montpellier Angers attack through Rayan Ait-Nouri. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
Angers's Sada Thioub gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Montpellier have a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Sada Thioub (Angers) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Antonin Bobichon for Angers gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Montpellier.
In the minute 81, Stephanie Frappart awards the away team a throw-in.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Angers drives forward and Abdoulaye Bamba gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 82, Angers have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
Ismael Traore of Angers gets in a strike, but is off target.
Stephanie Frappart awards Montpellier a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Angers in their own half.
Free kick for Angers in the half of Montpellier.
Stephy Mavididi is replacing Andy Delort for the home team.
In the minute 84, The home team replace Jordan Ferri with Joris Chotard.
Ball safe as Montpellier is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Great finish from Florent Mollet to give Montpellier a 4-1 lead.
In the minute 86, Gaetan Laborde with an assist there.
Montpellier's Stephy Mavididi is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Montpellier's Florent Mollet misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Angers goal kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Montpellier are coming forward and Stephy Mavididi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Angers have a goal kick.
It's 4-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
